title: White Australia Policy
creator_contributor_role: Student Action of Melbourne University, production company
subject_group: Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Australia - Emigration and immigration
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Civil rights - Australia
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Political science
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/White Australia Policy
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Student movements
description: A documentary record culled from television and other news reports on the White Australia Policy as it found expression in topical incidents in 1961, 1962 and 1963. It is a protest against the White Australia Policy and a record of the events in the history of Student Action. Compiled and edited by Peter Tammer. Dedicated to the memory of Bill Thomas, student leader.
